title: Artificial Intelligence–Based Copilots to Generate Causal Evidence
details: M Petersen, A Alaa, E Kıcıman, C Holmes… - NEJM AI, 2024
abstract: While there is growing consensus that real-world data should play a larger role in generating causal evidence for health care, it is less clear whether and how AI can help. Current approaches to AI-driven analysis of health data are ill-equipped to …

title: Sli2Vol+: Segmenting 3D Medical Images Based on an Object Estimation Guided Correspondence Flow Network
details: D An, P Gu, M Sonka, C Wang, DZ Chen - arXiv preprint arXiv:2411.13873, 2024
abstract: Deep learning (DL) methods have shown remarkable successes in medical image segmentation, often using large amounts of annotated data for model training. However, acquiring a large number of diverse labeled 3D medical image datasets is …
